messages.content:
rwrite ins imple eng - Whether you are posting a job, having trouble with the website, or trying to solve an issue, our great and attentive customer service staff will be there to assist you.
Be at ease with Pros Marketplace, as you will receive the help you need to ensure you are getting the most out of it regardless of whether you are a hiring manager or a job seeker

If you're posting a job, facing any issues with the website, or need help solving a problem, our excellent and responsive customer service team is here to assist you. Relax with Pros Marketplace, knowing you'll get the support you need to make the most of it, whether you're hiring or looking for a job.
Smoke and fog combined is commonly known as "smog."

simpel erwd coomoin eng - If you’re posting a job, facing any issues with the website, or need help solving a problem, our excellent and responsive customer service team is here to assist you. Relax with Pros Marketplace, knowing you’ll get the support you need to make the most of it, whether you’re hiring or looking for a job

If you're putting up a job, having trouble with the site, or need help with a problem, our great customer service team is ready to help you out. Feel comfortable using Pros Marketplace, as you'll get the help you need, no matter if you're hiring or seeking a job.

in rpfashinal tone - If you’re posting a job, facing any issues with the website, or need help solving a problem, our excellent and responsive customer service team is here to assist you. Relax with Pros Marketplace, knowing you’ll get the support you need to make the most of it, whether you’re hiring or looking for a job

Should you be in the process of advertising a position, encountering difficulties with our platform, or in need of assistance in resolving any challenges, please be assured that our outstanding and prompt customer service team stands ready to support you. Have confidence in engaging with Pros Marketplace, secure in the knowledge that comprehensive assistance is at your disposal to optimize your experience, irrespective of whether your objective is to recruit or to find employment.

humanRole.rationale: Human primarily requests outputs from the AI (definitions/rewrites) and also specifies constraints (tone/simplicity), mixing provider and director behaviors.

aiRole.rationale: AI provides direct answers and rewrites on request (expert-system), while also adapting text to specified constraints (co-constructor).
